dialogue.speaker: Professor Oak
dialogue.text: Welcome, young trainer! I'm Professor Oak. I've been expecting you. Your very own Pokémon journey is about to begin!

dialogue.speaker: Main Character
dialogue.text: I'm so excited! I've always dreamed of becoming a Pokémon Master.

dialogue.speaker: Professor Oak
dialogue.text: Excellent attitude! But first, you'll need to choose your very first Pokémon. Which one would you like?
